# Time Tracker
A comprehensive time tracking solution for businesses:
* Manage customers and projects * Track working time per project * Generate monthly reports per customer and project * Employee working time reports compliant with German labor law * Holiday and vacation management * Automatic compliance checks for German working time regulations
Perfect for agencies and companies that need to track billable hours and ensure compliance with German labor laws (Arbeitszeitgesetz).
